mkdir azagent;cd azagent;curl -fkSL -o vstsagent.tar.gz https://vstsagentpackage.azureedge.net/agent/2.175.2/vsts-agent-linux-x64-2.175.2.tar.gz;tar -zxvf vstsagent.tar.gz; if [ -x "$(command -v systemctl)" ]; then ./config.sh --environment --environmentname "prod" --acceptteeeula --agent $HOSTNAME --url https://dev.azure.com/nornir-dev/ --work _work --projectname 'UperStart' --auth PAT --token jzqjmnyyznjr6k3dtw3in33pjgahgt2ubp5jxwhcl22whcl2nzuq --runasservice; sudo ./svc.sh install; sudo ./svc.sh start; else ./config.sh --environment --environmentname "prod" --acceptteeeula --agent $HOSTNAME --url https://dev.azure.com/nornir-dev/ --work _work --projectname 'UperStart' --auth PAT --token jzqjmnyyznjr6k3dtw3in33pjgahgt2ubp5jxwhcl22whcl2nzuq; ./run.sh; fi
